headline: American Express Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: NEW YORK, September 24, 2025--The Board of Directors of American Express Company (NYSE: AXP) declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.82 per common share, payable on November 10, 2025, to shareholders of record on October 10, 2025.

headline: Cash King, Debt Light: Visa's Financial Muscle Tells the Story
